root.name: F1 2012
root.description: The 2012 edition will contain many new features including the implementation of the Young Driver's Test in Abu Dhabi, which will teach players the nuances of F1, as well as a new scenario based Champions Mode pitting you against each of the six WDC champions competing in the 2012 FIA Formula One World Championship. The game was released on September 18th in North America, September 20th in Australia and September 21st in Europe.Teams and DriversRed Bull Racing1. Sebastian Vettel - German2. Mark Webber - AustralianVodafone Mclaren-Mercedes3. Jenson Button - British4. Lewis Hamilton - BritishScuderia Ferrari5. Fernando Alonso - Spanish6. Felipe Massa - BrazilianMercedes AMG Petronas F1 Team7. Michael Schumacher - German8. Nico Rosberg - GermanLotus F1 Team9. Kimi Räikkönen - Finnish10. Romain Grosjean - FrenchSahara Force India F1 Team11. Paul di Resta - British12. Nico Hülkenberg - GermanSauber F1 Team14. Kamui Kobayashi - Japanese15. Sergio Perez - MexicanScuderia Toro Rosso16. Daniel Ricciardo - Australian17. Jean-Éric Vergne - FrenchWilliams F1 Team18. Pastor Maldonado - Venezuelan19. Bruno Senna - BrazilianCaterham F1 Team20. Heikki Kovalainen - Finnish21. Vitaly Petrov - RussianHRT F1 Team22. Pedro de la Rosa - Spanish23. Narain Karthikeyen - IndianMarussia F1 Team24. Timo Glock - German25. Charles Pic - FrenchPC System RequirementsMinimum:Windows Vista or Windows 7Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.4Ghz or AMD Athlon X2 5400+2 GB RAMDirectX Compatible Sound Card15 GB Hard Drive SpaceDual Layer Compatible DVD-ROM DriveGraphics Card: AMD HD2600 or NVIDIA Geforce 8600Recommended:Windows Vista or Windows 7 64 bitAMD Bulldozer or Intel Core i74GB RAMDirectX Compatible Sound Card15 GB Hard Drive SpaceDual Layer Compatible DVD-ROM DriveGraphics Card: AMD HD6000 Series or Nvidia GTX500 SeriesSupported Graphics Cards:AMD Radeon HD2600 or higher, HD3650 or higher, HD4550 or higher, HD5000 Series, HD6000 Series, HD7000 Series.nVidia GeForce 8600 or higher, 9500 or higher, GTX220 or higher, GTX400 Series, GTX500 Series, GTX600 Series.
